name: Lost Alien
description:
You have landed on an uninhabited planet, your task is to find out if there is life on it, or what kind of activity. Beware of enemies, explore the world and complete the task, no matter what.

The game combines elements of platforming, puzzle and planetary exploration.

In Lost Alien, you have to complete various tasks, fight comical enemies and, most importantly, survive!

You are expected by various levels, interesting tasks and a lot of traps and enemies!
